metadata.title: CVE-2014-9057 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the XML-RPC interface in Movable Type before5.18, 5.2.x before 5.2.11, and 6.x before 6.0.6 allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
